contentrichtext.text: {{about|the seldom voice-only actor|the usually voice-only actor|John Snyder (voice actor)}} {{Other people|John Snyder}} {{no footnotes|date=March 2013}} '''John Snyder''' (born 1950 Boston MA) is an American film, stage and television actor, who graduated from [[Boston University]]'s School of Fine and Applied Arts with a BFA in 1974. Snyder played the gas station man in the [[1979 in film|1979 film]] ''[[The Warriors (film)|The Warriors]]''. He portrayed "Soul Hunter #2" in "[[Soul Hunter (Babylon 5)|Soul Hunter]]" and "Orin Zento" in "[[By Any Means Necessary (Babylon 5)|By Any Means Necessary]]", episodes of ''[[Babylon 5]]'', and as Aaron Conor in the ''[[Star Trek: The Next Generation]]'' episode "[[The Masterpiece Society]]" also as the Romulan Bochra in the episode "The Enemy". He appeared in many TV series and films from 1979 to 2004, and appears as Damian in ''[[Love Sick Diaries]]''. ==External links== *{{IMDb name|id=0811487|name=John Snyder}} *{{memoryalpha|John Snyder}} * http://www.nowcasting.com/actor/popup/viewactor.php?page=resume&actorID=johnsnyder {{Authority control|VIAF=115591054}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Snyder, John | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American actor | DATE OF BIRTH = 1950 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Snyder, John}} [[Category:American film actors]] [[Category:American television actors]] [[Category:1950 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Actors from Boston, Massachusetts]] {{US-screen-actor-stub}}
